title: Banana Bread
description: A classic banana bread recipe that is moist, flavorful, and perfect for breakfast or a snack. This easy-to-make bread is packed with ripe bananas and can be enjoyed fresh or toasted.
instructions: Beat oil and sugar; add eggs and bananas, beating well. Blend in flour, soda, baking powder and salt. Add milk and vanilla; mix well. Stir in nuts. Turn into greased 9x5x3-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees about 60 minutes.
